titles: The tryal of Edward Coleman, Gent. for conspiring the death of the King, and the subversion of the government of England and the Protestant religion who upon full evidence was found guilty of high treason, and received sentence accordingly, on Thursday, November the 28th, 1678.
author: Coleman, Edward, d. 1678, defendant.
England and Wales. Court of King's Bench.
notes: Reproduction of original in University of Michigan Libraries.
keywords: Coleman, Edward, d. 1678 --  Trials, litigation, etc.
